item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Pleased to announce investment of $4 million for maintenance, repair, construction and dredging projects for small craft harbours in PEI.

item.title: Mentioned by BG.com (прессъобщения) (press release)
item.description:
Minister Fantino and Minister Shea Present Awards of Excellence to Local ... - PR
The Honourable Julian Fantino, Minister of Veterans Affairs, and the honourable Gail Shea, Minister of Fisheries and Oceans and Member of Parliament for Egmont, presented awards of excellence to Master Corporal Shane Coyle, Sergeant Brian Duncan ...

item.title: Mentioned by Daily Business Buzz
item.description:
PE: Charlottetown convention centre $7 million over budget
Robert Vessey, from left, minister, transportation and infrastructure renewal, joins Gail Shea, Egmont MP and minister of national revenue, and Premier Robert Ghiz as they prepare to cut a giant cake designed like the P.E.I. Convention Centre. - Nigel.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Pleased to attend the official opening of the Evangeline Exhibition and Acadian Festival in Abram Village today.
